targets.expr: max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_logical_used_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_quota_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_quota_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_volume_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_written_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_reservation_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_available_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_creation{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"}) * 1000
sum by(name) (delta(zfs_dataset_logical_referenced_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: When quota is not set, this is expected to be empty.

targets.expr:
max_over_time(zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) /
(max_over_time(zfs_dataset_quota_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) != 0)

panels.title: Quota %

panels.description: When ref quota is not set, this is expected to be empty.

targets.expr:
max by(name) (max_over_time(zfs_dataset_referenced_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) /
(last_over_time(zfs_dataset_referenced_quota_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) != 0))

panels.title: Ref Quota %

panels.description:
When volumes are not listed, this is expected to be empty.
Amount of storage logically allocated to volume. Volumes without discard can have this value artificially high.

targets.expr:
max by(name) (max_over_time(zfs_dataset_logical_used_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) /
max_over_time(zfs_dataset_volume_size_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Volume allocated %

targets.expr: sum by (dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum by (dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance=~"$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum by (dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_reads{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (dataset) (
  rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]) /
  (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_reads{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)
)
sum by (dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_writes{instance=~"$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (dataset) (
  rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]) /
  (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_writes{instance="$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)
)

list.definition: query_result(zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance="$instance", pool="$pool", name=~".*(${dataset_filter}).*", type=~"$type", type="filesystem"} or zfs_dataset_volume_size_bytes{instance="$instance", pool="$pool", name=~".*(${dataset_filter}).*"} > ($low_limit + 0) * $limit_suffix)
list.name: dataset

query.query: query_result(zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance="$instance", pool="$pool", name=~".*(${dataset_filter}).*", type=~"$type", type="filesystem"} or zfs_dataset_volume_size_bytes{instance="$instance", pool="$pool", name=~".*(${dataset_filter}).*"} > ($low_limit + 0) * $limit_suffix)
